successes.title: Between Two Cities
successes.description: Design unique and beautiful cities in this partnership-driven, 20-minute, competitive tile-drafting game for 1-7 players.

Pledges.description: TOAST - You and your favorite city will be toasted on camera by the publishers. Add the toast to other reward levels for $1.
BETWEEN TWO CITIES - 1 copy of Between Two Cities with all stretch goals. Add up to 2 extra copies for $29 each.

SPECIAL EDITION - 1 copy of Between Two Cities with all stretch goals, 14 more city tokens (7 pairs; these are purely aesthetic additions) and an individually numbered gold foil embossed game box. Add at most 1 extra copy for $39. (Rules in English, French, & German.)
BUNDLE - 3 copies of the Special Edition. This is the number of games we can fit into a shipping carton with proper packaging, so no extra copies can be added.
